results.description:
Manipulation. The next utility skill you use has significantly reduced recharge, and Mimic's recharge is increased by the original recharge of the affected skill.
Mimic's recharge cannot be reset by other mesmer skills.

facts.description: Your next utility skill will recharge faster.

name: Mimic
Imitation

results.description: Phantasm. Throw an illusionary greatsword at your foe, removing boons from struck enemies. Create a phantasm that whirls through foes.
name: Phantasmal Berserker
Berserker fantasmal
Trügerischer Berserker
Berserker fantasmagorique

results.description: Throw an illusionary blade that creates a clone at its first target and then bounces to enemies and allies, dealing less damage to foes per hit and granting might to allies.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.
Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

name: Mirror Blade
Espada espejo
